roleset.name: ask questions repeatedly
roleset.note: QUIZ-V NOTES: Frames file for 'quiz' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 35.4, Framenet entry Questioning. (from quiz.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: But a House Energy and Commerce subcommittee will quiz SEC Chairman Breeden Wednesday, and Treasury Secretary Brady will go before the Senate Banking panel Thursday.
example.arg: a House Energy and Commerce subcommittee

example.name: with topic
example.text: Mary quizzed John about the lipstick on his collar.
example.arg: about the lipstick on his collar
